data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tishechkin, Alexey K., Konstantinov, Alexander S., Bista, Sanjay, Pemberton, Robert W., Center, Ted D. (2011): Review of the continental Oriental species of Lilioceris Reitter (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Criocerinae) closely related to Lilioceris impressa (F.). ZooKeys 103: 63-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.103.983, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.103.983
